scripts.debug: node -e "console.log('=== DEBUG INSTRUMENTATION START ==='); const fs=require('fs'); const dirs=fs.readdirSync('.', {withFileTypes:true}).filter(d=>d.isDirectory()).map(d=>d.name); console.log('Directories:', dirs.length, '| Has proper structure:', dirs.includes('src')&&dirs.includes('docs')&&dirs.includes('infra')); const envExists=fs.existsSync('.env'); console.log('Env file exists:', envExists); const pkgExists=fs.existsSync('package.json'); console.log('Package.json exists:', pkgExists); const dcExists=fs.existsSync('infra/docker-compose.yml'); console.log('Docker compose exists:', dcExists); console.log('=== DEBUG COMPLETE ===');"
scripts.system-check: node -e "console.log('=== SYSTEM STATE ANALYSIS ==='); console.log('Node.js version:', process.version); console.log('Environment vars with PORT/URL:', Object.keys(process.env).filter(k => k.includes('PORT') || k.includes('URL')).length); console.log('Current directory files:', require('fs').readdirSync('.').length); const fs=require('fs'); let jsFiles=0, customImports=0, vendorImports=0; function walkDir(dir){const files=fs.readdirSync(dir);for(const f of files){const p=require('path').join(dir,f);const s=fs.statSync(p);if(s.isDirectory()&&!f.startsWith('.')&&f!=='node_modules'){walkDir(p);}else if(f.endsWith('.js')||f.endsWith('.ts')){jsFiles++;try{const c=fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8');const imports=c.match(/import.*from\s+['\"]([^\"]+)['\"]/g)||[];const requires=c.match(/require\s*\(\s*['\"]([^\"]+)['\"]/g)||[];[...imports,...requires].forEach(m=>{if(m.includes('./')||m.includes('../'))customImports++;else if(m.includes('@')||m.includes('/'))vendorImports++;});}catch(e){}}}}walkDir('src'); console.log('JS/TS files:', jsFiles, '| Custom imports:', customImports, '| Vendor imports:', vendorImports, '| Vendor ratio:', ((vendorImports/(vendorImports+customImports))*100).toFixed(1)+'%');"
